comment.author: 52583849@N04
comment._content: Fiat G.49 - note differences in rudder and canopy from other shot of Piaggio P.150

comment.author: 72347661@N02
comment._content:
Then why does the fin state P.150?
Why does the rear end show MM555?
Since the Piaggio P.150 was initially built with "bubble" type canopies, this is of course the Piaggio before modification of its canopy. While generally looking the same, the Fiat G.49 prototype had no MM number and a different engine mounting plus other detailed differences.
Stig
